products.longDescription:
• VIZIO Internet Apps Plus® – Instantly enjoy the latest hit movies, TV shows, music and even more premium apps made for the big screen¹
  • Full-Array LED backlight – Distributes LEDs behind the entire screen delivering superior light uniformity and picture performance
  • 32 Active LED Zones – Dynamically adjusts the LED backlight per zone creating deeper, pure black levels and higher contrast
  • Clear Action 720 – Enhanced motion clarity with 240Hz effective refresh rate and powerful image processing for stunning sharp detail in sports and fast action scenes.
  • Active Pixel Tuning – Intelligent pixel-level brightness adjustments for increased picture accuracy and contrast.
  • Built-in Wi-Fi – Easily connect to the Internet with ultra-fast 802.11n wireless
  • 1080p Full HD resolution – Enjoy high-definition TV with a crystal-clear picture
  • 20 million to 1 DCR  – Exceptionally high contrast for deeper blacks and more radiant whites.
  • M-Series Signature Design – Give your room a designer upgrade with the ultra-narrow, near borderless design of M-Series
  • Smart remote with backlit keyboard – Easy to search and type, even in the dark
  • 4 HDMI ports – Perfect for connecting your high definition entertainment devices to the TV
  • 1 USB ports – share photos, music, and video right on the big screen
  • DTS Studio Sound – Advanced virtual surround sound audio from VIZO’s two built-in speakers
  • New TV settings menu with on-screen user manual – More intuitive menu system with quick, on-screen access to the user manual. No need to search for a paper user manual.
  • Ambient Light Sensor – Intelligent backlight sensors automatically adjust to surrounding brightness for a great picture in virtually any room.
  • Energy Star 6.0  – More energy efficient than conventional CCFL-based LCD TVs to save you even more on energy bills
